title: Bug 24586[Dialogs] Changed initial focus behaviour
description: Bug 24586[Dialogs] Changed initial focus behaviour Build 20021008 Win2kSomething changed (for the worse) in the focus behaviour this build.Forexample, select a project in eclipse, and press delete.The warning dialog'sinitial focus is now on the default button (instead of the radio buttons in thedialog).This is possibly a regression on bug 14981.
